is a village on the island of
The small harbour is one of the access points to the island of

with a ferry and water taxis.

As no cars are allowed on Hiddensee many people drive to Schaprode then go by foot or bike from here. The village has basically become a large car park.
Walk along the coast north of the village provides views of the island of Hiddensee with plenty of opportunity for bird watching.

value: content=Café az the harbour, simple very tasteful local food and drink.

There are a number of holiday apartments to rent as well as a camp-site.
